p: All 102 positive samples were submitted to a cDNA synthesis protocol [ 30] using ProtoScript II First Strand cDNA Synthesis Kit. Then, a multiplex tiling PCR was conducted using Q5 High Fidelity Hot-Start DNA Polymerase (New England Biolabs) and CHIKV sequencing primers scheme (primers are divided into two separated pools, A and B) designed using Primal Scheme ( http://primal.zibraproject.org) [ 31]. The thermocycling conditions involved 45 cycles, and reaction conditions were previously reported in [ 31].
